title: News: More Acts Announced For Field Day 2012
content:
London’s prestigious Field Day Festival today announced a host of line-up additions, including Liars, Korallreven and 2012 buzz band Friends.

With these latest inclusions, the event which takes place on 2 June, is already shaping up to be one of the essential music ventures of the summer. Now in it’s fifth year, Field Day attracts over 20,000 people and has previously seen performances from the likes of Florence & The Machine, Phoenix and Battles, amongst many other illustrious artists. These new additions join the likes of Scots rockers Franz Ferdinand, CitR favourite Com Truise and the much hyped Grimes. Tickets are priced at £45 and can be purchased here and for more information on the event check out the official Field Day website. Full line-up below.

Afrocubism / Andrew Bird / Baxter Dury / Beirut / Blawan / Com Truise / Daniel Avery (Stopmakingme) / Death Grips / Django Django / Errors / Fennesz / Franz Ferdinand / Friends / Gold Panda / Grimes / Here We Go Magic / Hudson Mohawke – Live / Huw Stephens DJ Set / Jeffrey Lewis & The Junkyard / Julia Holter / Julio Bashmore / Justin Spear DJ Set / Kindness / Korallreven / Koreless / Liars / Metronomy / Modeselektor / Outfit / Maya Jane Coles / Mazzy Star / Papa M / Peaking Lights / R. Stevie Moore / Revere / Rocketnumbernine / Rustie / SBTRKT / Spector / THE MEN / Theme Park / Tortoise / To Kill a King / The Vaccines / Zomby / Zulu Winter

Photo: Field Day 2011
